hadiths.text: Ad-Dahhak bin Qais asked An-Nu'man bin Bashir:"What did the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) use to recite on Friday after Surat Al-Jumu'ah?" He said: "He used to recite: 'Has there come to you the narration of the overwhelming (i.e. the Day of Resurrection)?'" (Al-Ghashiyah)

chapter.ara-name: ذِكْرُ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى النُّعْمَانِ بْنِ بَشِيرٍ فِي الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي صَلاَةِ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Differing Reports From An-Nu'man Regarding Recitation During The Jumu'ah Prayer
